# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/qtip2`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for qtip2 (http://qtip2.com/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/qtip2

Additional Details

 * Dependencies: jquery
 * Global values: none
